mapper.insert: insert into reply(re_num, bo_num, re_reply, re_name, re_profile,re_id) values((select nvl(max(re_num), 0)+1 from reply), #{bo_num}, #{re_reply}, #{re_name}, #{re_profile},#{re_id})
mapper.update: update reply set re_reply = #{re_reply}, re_updateDate = sysdate where re_num = #{re_num}
mapper.select: select count(re_num) from reply where bo_num = #{bo_num}
